name: Empire Clicker
description:
In Empire Clicker, click on tiles to expand your empire! You can either buy them or conquer them
When you need resources, skip to the next turn and let them flow in!

Try to conquer all the cities before your character dies of old age, and always have an army ready for enemy attacks!

Use Arrow Keys to move around the map, Tab to see the whole map and Space to return to your capital city's position!
